phrases: Be careful, alright?
And it is fine if you decide to head right on back here, you know!
I am counting on you to take care of Riko!
Understood.
You guys care take of yourselves, too.
Thank you to both of you!
Keep an eye out for the good news I will be sending!
Well then, we are off now!
These new adventurers...
Welling up inside them is courage, wit, and curiosity.
On their path, hope and despair alike are lying in wait.
Daremo ga sakaraezu ni mogutteiku
Sono me o tomoshibi yori kagayakasete
Mezasu saki wa fukaku
Massugu ni mayoikomu
Kuchiaketa naraku no wana
Shinjitsu no ato o oikakeyou
I Am About To kotae ga mitsukaru nara zenbu nakushitemo ii
Sono koe o hanasanai youni kodama ga mada hibiiteru
Rashinban wa zutto
Yami o sashita mama
Nigeba no nai
Hou e
Sore ga noroi demo
Kodou wa honmono
Nidoto akogare wa tomaranai
Uh, Reg... wake up.
Who is there?!
Reg?
Huh?
Huh?
I wonder when I drifted off to sleep...
Sorry about that...
Your belly was just so warm, Reg.
It is understandable.
We hardly ever stay up that late, after all.
Here.
Thanks.
Reg...
you have any idea where we are?
We dropped directly down from the Wharf District, but I could not really say what area we are in...
The depth gauge is indicating 820 meters.
Riko, what is it?
Amazing...
It is way brighter here than up on the surface, huh?
Ah, over there!
It is the Rock Ark, located at a depth of 600 meters...
It is so far above us!
Not long ago, I was aiming for a depth of 400 meters...
and now we cannot even see it anymore!
So, due to the distortion in the force field, we cannot see the surface, huh?
That boundary looks awfully bright...
Is that distortion carrying the light downward?
How terrific, Reg!
At this pace we can make it to the bottom of the netherworld!
Of course, we cannot let our guard down, you know.
We might even make it all way to the second layer before anyone comes after us.
W-well that is good to hear.
By the way, Riko...
Let us have some breakfast...
Yeah.
Take out the demonfish innards making sure not to damage them,
and smoke them to keep as preserved food.
As for the meat, put a hearty helping in a pot and sprinkle a bit of ground-up Eternal Fortunes on top.
Mix in some stick miso, and then once you throw in a bunch of diced sainona greens...
Ta-da!
My special Riko Soup is ready!
Irredeemable...
Oh, it tastes better than Riko Bombs!
Riko, what is that you are playing around with?
It is my Star Compass.
Ah, something that helps you tell up from down...?
Wrong!
It points to the bottom of the netherworld!
Let me take a look.
It is not magnetic or weighted...
How strange.
Even if you shake it or rotate it around, the direction of the needle does not budge a bit.
Really?!
Give it here!
Another Relic of the Abyss, huh?
I get the feeling there is some incomprehensible principle at work...
However, is that thing really even useful?
It is fine.
It is fine, really...
All that which is taken from the Abyss will someday be returned to it.
Whether it be an object or a life...
The Abyss is greedy like that, you know?
I-I see...
The teachings of cave raiders are quite humble...
Yeah, Leader taught that to me.
Ah!
That is right!
We were rushing around so much I forgot all about this!
What is this?
An envelope...?
Well, go ahead and take a look inside.
This is...
my mother's sealed letter!
Reg, did you make off with this?!
Nope, take a closer look.
The pages we saw last time were tattered.
So this is probably just a copy, right?
You are right.
Before we left the orphanage, I actually bumped into Leader.
Huh?!
I thought that I really had him fooled, but...
I suddenly realized that thing was in my back pocket, and...
I think he is pretty much the only one who could have done it.
Leader... I wonder if he is cheering us on...
There is a page that is a different size than the others.
I will depart at dawn to come capture you?!
Reg, do you have any idea how long it is been since dawn?!
Nope...
But, considering that it was already bright out when we woke up...
Hurry!
We have got to get going quick!
Reg, go hide any traces of the campfire!
I am on it!
Uh, I will...
go check that we are not leaving anything behind!
Are you ready?
Of course.
Let us go!
Shiggy said that if we make it to the second layer, no one will come after us.
But, why would Leader do something so contrary to normal?
He must be testing us.
This is our final lesson.
The point is that if we get caught now,
we never had any chance of making it to the bottom of the netherworld...
Reg...
Behind us...
Jump right now!
Silkfangs cannot leave their territory!
It will act as an anchor!
What an irredeemable plan!
Seems it gave up and let go...
Riko, you okay?
Yeah, I am okay.
I am just fine.
She is not used to this, so I bet it is really draining her stamina.
It is her first time this deep...
We are on an untracked path...
and on top of that...
Seems our pursuers still have not caught up with us yet.
We have strayed from the usual route...
so even if they come after us, they will not find us that easily.
Besides, the search parties move in groups of at least three people,
so we should see them com-
What is it, Riko?
Look at that, Reg!
The break in the clouds there...
It is the second layer: the Forest of Temptation!
So this is the second layer.
If a Red Whistle goes down there, it is treated as a suicide.
Where?!
What was that...?
My own voice...?
Oof!
Riko?!
The view's so amazing I just kind of collapsed.
Riko, let us take a little break.
Huh?
But...
I need to take a pee, anyway.
Ah, well, then I will too.
Riko, I was thinking about your delusion about the meaning of the letter...
About it being our final lesson?
That is no delusion!
Yeah...
I have a feeling you are not mistaken.
Leader said it is necessary for him to patrol every night.
Perhaps he was able to see through us and uncover our nightly plotting,
and even the fact that I am a robot...
On top of that, if he took the trouble to place that envelope in my pocket,
we need to make a clean escape and show him we are up to the task.
Yeah!
What is the matter, Reg?
What is that?
Something flashed over there!
Huh?!
It was around that group of three boulders up there...
Y-you think it is a search party?
It is a cave raider!
There is just one of them... but he is heading straight for us!
What gives?!
We even took care to stay off the usual route...
Taking the trouble to head down this way off the main route...
There is no doubt he is targeting us.
Let us hurry!
Reg...
you see our pursuer anywhere?
I am trying to look now.
Think we can give him the slip before we reach the second layer?
Ah, uh...
He is... right above us...
Huh?!
What the heck?
He is way too fast.
He is caught up to us.
It is just one person...
Can we somehow slip away?
I would expect nothing less from Lyza's daughter.
You are pretty darn fast, huh, Riko?
Habo?!
But why?
How about that?
I have got some skills of my own, do not you think?
Black Whistle Hablog...
To think someone who is not a White Whistle could be so skilled...
What should I do?!
I could let Riko escape alone first...
That being said...
well, I never suspected it!
That you were a supreme treasure of the netherworld, I mean!
Is even your skin a Relic?
You sure cannot tell just by looking at it!
Huh?!
Oh, nothing mechanical about those balls of yours, I see!
Stop it!
Let me go!
Hey, stop kicking.
Taking into account the weight of your backpack, you are pretty darn light...
I guess he still has not learned the hand signals...
Sorry, my bad.
I still have not told you what I am here about.
You see...
I am not actually here to capture you two.
Huh?
Nat and Shiggy came and paid me a visit...
Please!
I am not asking you to take them all the way to the Seeker Camp!
Just at least help them escape to the second layer!
Besides, this is your last chance to see the true form of a supreme treasure of the netherworld!
Reg was really fast...
but I am sure, Habo, with your speed you can cat-
So...
You are telling me Reg is truly a treasure of the netherworld, right?
Y-yes!
I am going!
So, you see, I came to pay my respects to this supreme treasure of the netherworld.
I wish paying your respects was the only thing you did...
By the way, the search party was looking for you by the Twisting Crag.
I suppose they will take a while still.
Well then...
I have had a look at the treasure of the netherworld, so I better fulfill my promise to those boys...
Let us go, you two!
I am coming along with you to the Seeker Camp!
Really?!
You bet.
It will be reassuring to have a Black Whistle with us.
Right, Riko?
Habo... uh... um...
Oh, what is it?
I am sorry!
I cannot allow that!
Huh?!
You must be kidding...
This right here... is our final lesson!
Huh?
Oh, I see!
Pretty clever of him, really.
Well, if this is indeed your final lesson, I will not get in your way.
But he should have come himself to see you off one last time...
Ah, but that would not work'because he would catch you right away then, huh?!
I am sorry, Habo.
You came all the way down here...
It is no problem!
Actually, I have some other business down here, anyway.
Here.
What is this?
It is a vaccine for the second layer that Blue Whistles and up take.
It will generally spare you from picking up the diving illness down there.
Also, these are left over from yesterday, but here is some mustard steamed buns to keep you going.
Do not wait too long to eat them.
Thank you, Habo!
Lastly, and also most importantly...
Since I will not be accompanying you any further, I should tell you this now.
About that monitoring base called Seeker Camp you are headed to,
the guardian there is a bit of a strange one.
You mean the person who found the sealed letter from my mom?
Yes...
The Unmovable Sovereign, Ozen the Immovable...
a White Whistle who is still active.
After you were born in the depths of the Abyss,
she is the one who carried you to the surface along with Lyza.
A White Whistle?!
And the very one who saved my life?!
Wow!
But, Hablog, that does not seem like anything to be too worried about...
Please be wary of the White Whistle, Ozen.
I cannot personally go into the details, but Riko might encounter some distressing things there...
Please be prepared.
It is alright!
I would like to meet a White Whistle, in any case!
And stuff about my mom...
and about the time when she found my mom's sealed letter...
I have got to ask about all that.
And besides, besides...
Let us see...
You are right.
You will be fine.
You have got a reassuring partner with you, after all.
Reg, take care of Riko.
Understood.
Leave it to me.
Well, we are heading out now, Habo.
Alright, off you go.
But if you dawdle around I will become a White Whistle and catch up to you, you know.
Okay.
Give my best to Auntie!
Sure!
At any rate, we are all just the netherworld's lost children...
Sooner or later, I knew this day would come...
Reg, over there!
It is a wind-riding windmill!
Oh?
What is that?
A long time ago they used those to capture updrafts, apparently.
I hear they have been around for more than 4,000 years.
They have done well to last so long.
The fact that we have passed by them means...
This is the depths' second layer...
We did it, Reg!
We have survived our final lesson!
Is that so?
Sure is!
Leader, we pulled it off!
It has not really hit me yet...
Did we really get away from them?
That is right!
We do not have to worry about anyone pursuing us anymore!
If we descend down this far, no help will be sent after us...
That is because both heading here and returning home become very difficult...
I am quite sure that is what Shiggy said.
So, in other words, down here even the search party would find that it itself is the one being pursued.
Let us hurry on, Reg.
It might be calling all of its buddies over here.
Yeah...
It is not that we have successfully escaped...
Is not it rather that we are now being pursued by all kinds of things that exist outside the territory of man?
Sora ni ukanderu hikaru nami o
Tabanete niji no hashi o kakeyou
Ayaui ashiba, suberu slope
Kako to mirai no michishirube
Kimi no hidarite, boku no migite o
Tsunaide tsunagete hajimeyou
Itsumo soba ni iru yo
Kako mo i am about to mo mirai mo
Dakara mayowazu ni aruiteikou
Irotoridori no yume kasanete
Ashita wa doko ni mukau
Kimi to issho ni iretara, sekai wa kagayakidasu yo
Saihate no chi ni saku hana o sagasou
